welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cabeceiras de Basto, a charming city nestled in the heart of Portugal. Known for its breathtaking landscapes, rich history, and warm hospitality, we invite you to discover and indulge in all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vila Real Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Vila Real Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Braga Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
